description: Details of the contract have been cancelled.
full_summary:
**Cancelled: Request for Construction Services - QU22SLSN**
==============================================

### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** QU22SLSN
*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01017005
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-12-13
*   **Tender Closing Date:** Expired (31 MAR 2026 14:00:00)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Information (Demande de renseignements)

### Services Requirements

The solicitation was intended to procure services related to construction. This includes various types of building construction such as residential, multi-dwelling, warehouses, industrial buildings, and general heavy construction among others.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation may be subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

The procurement was open to:
*   Canada
*   Europe
*   Mexico
*   United States

### Contact Information

For any inquires, please contact:

*   Mark Smith
*   mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
*   Phone: 613-859-0549

### Disclaimer

This notice has been cancelled. Further information may be obtained by contacting the contracting entity noted above.

### Attachment

There are no attachments or additional information for this solicitation.

### Procurement Method

The procurement method for this solicitation was competitive with open bidding.

### Contractor Responsibility

Contractors are responsible for their own operational and financial arrangements.

### Limitations

The procurement set out particulars have not been modified since the date of publication.

---

Please ensure to verify the information with the original government source documentation. This document is a reproduction of the information provided and may not be up to date. Any changes or additions may affect the availability and implementation of this service. Please check with the contracting entity for the most up-to-date information. ------
